name: tcl-d2c-tclbrasil-cypress-automation
description: Cypress automation framework for TCL BR

scripts.cy:run:desktop: dotenv -- cypress run --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=1921,viewportHeight=1081 --env environment=desktop
scripts.cy:run:mobile: dotenv -- cypress run --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667 --env environment=mobile
scripts.cy:run:smoke:desktop: dotenv -- cypress run --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=1921,viewportHeight=1081 --env environment=desktop --spec cypress/e2e/features/SmokeTest.feature
scripts.cy:run:smoke:mobile: dotenv -- cypress run --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667 --env environment=mobile --spec cypress/e2e/features/SmokeTest.feature
scripts.cy:open:mobile: dotenv -- cypress open --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667 --env environment=mobile
scripts.bs:run:desktop: dotenv -- browserstack-cypress run --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=1921,viewportHeight=1081 --env environment=desktop
scripts.bs:run:mobile: dotenv -- browserstack-cypress run --browser chrome -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667 --env environment=mobile
scripts.bs:regressive:desktop: npm run bs:run:desktop -- -b "TCL BR - Regressive Test Desktop"
scripts.bs:regressive:mobile: npm run bs:run:mobile -- -b "TCL BR - Regressive Test Mobile"
scripts.bs:smoke:desktop: npm run bs:run:desktop -- --spec cypress/e2e/features/SmokeTest.feature -b "TCL BR - Smoke Test Desktop"
scripts.bs:smoke:mobile: npm run bs:run:mobile -- --spec cypress/e2e/features/SmokeTest.feature -b "TCL BR - Smoke Test Mobile"
scripts.bs:smoke:theme:desktop: npm run bs:run:desktop -- --spec cypress/e2e/features/SmokeTest.feature -b "[CI/CD][${CYPRESS_DEPLOY_ENV}] - TCL BR - Store Theme - Smoke Test Desktop"
scripts.bs:smoke:theme:mobile: npm run bs:run:mobile -- --spec cypress/e2e/features/SmokeTest.feature -b "[CI/CD][${CYPRESS_DEPLOY_ENV}] - TCL BR - Store Theme - Smoke Test Mobile"
scripts.bs:spec:desktop: npm run bs:run:desktop -- --spec cypress/e2e/features/PdpTest.feature -b "TCL BR - Spec Test Desktop"
scripts.bs:spec:mobile: npm run bs:run:mobile -- --spec cypress/e2e/features/PdpTest.feature -b "TCL BR - Spec Test Mobile"
